alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 5:27PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Freezing drizzle will impact portions of central Chittenden and southwestern Franklin Counties through 630 PM EST... At 524 PM EST, freezing drizzle was reported at the Burlington Airport. A light glaze of ice has formed on elevated surfaces. HAZARD...Light freezing rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated and NWS verified. IMPACT...Some untreated spots, bridges, and overpasses will be icy and could be dangerous for motorists and pedestrians. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Burlington International Airport, South Burlington, Underhill, Jericho, Hinesburg, St. George, Essex, Westford, Jericho Village, Essex Junction Village, Fairfax, Williston, Bolton, Richmond, Milton, Winooski, Huntington, Georgia and Colchester. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 71 and 86, between mile markers 100 and 102, and between mile markers 107 and 110.
info.instruction: The freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
